org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore.modification

Interface Modification

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SerializableMessage
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CompositeModification
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractModification, DeleteModification, ImmutableCompositeModification, MergeModification, MutableCompositeModification, WriteModification

    public interface Modification
extends SerializableMessage
    Represents a modification to the data store.

    Simple modifications can be of type,

  • WriteModification
  • MergeModification
  • DeleteModification

    Modifications can in turn be lumped into a single CompositeModification which can then be applied to a write transaction

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(DOMStoreWriteTransaction transaction)
      Apply the modification to the specified transaction
